Articles.Content: If you have found/seen any anomalies/something wierd in the 0.20 update,post it here!
I do not believe there are any new ones, although I would not call it an anomaly is in the base description of Bop, about the Kraken.
I found a floating monolith a couple km north of the launch pad. It may have been there in previous versions, but I haven't noticed it until after 0.20 was released.
Yep, this one was always there
